text: (They will not harm you save a trifling hurt�) [3:111]. Said Muqatil: �The Jewish chieftains Ka�b, Bahra, al-Nu�man, Abu Rafi�, Abu Yasir and Ibn Surya went to �Abd Allah ibn Salam and his followers, who had believed, and hurt them because of their acceptance of Islam and so Allah, exalted is He, revealed this verse�.
